TopicTitle: how to update a craft link

Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I am going to release my new shuttle soon, but I would like to know how to integrate any suggestions into the shuttle, without making it a brand new ship and having to upload 2 of them to kerbalx. I just want 1 shuttle that I can update constantly, instead of having over 30 uploads of the same ship with minor fixes.

Sadly, having run my Saturn Shuttle series (link in sig), that is sadly the route your going to have to take. I just have a blank vehicle in my VAB and every time I want to launch another payload I save it as it's mission ID. Takes a lot more time, but that's the only solution I know.
